title: What is the criteria for management seat and how much extra?
content:
I heard someone say you need 80% to be eligible for management seat (I think im almost eligible except for my ug 10th - 85% 12th - 87% UG - 7.98) 

Also how much extra do I need to pay for a management seat?

comments.body: For cse it's 12 Lakh per year , and I am not sure u can still get seat now as they were asking us to enter the board marks and stuff , 80% in pcm boards is more than enough but slightly less also accepted
I was asking for MCA not btech cse but thanks anyways (There are no direct MCA seats apparently you have to pass the interview)
